channel.title: Making Quest tab say words in it? [Delta 317]

item.title: Making Quest tab say words in it? [Delta 317]
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Hello, I go my quest tab working, it was not working before when i clicked on it.

When i couldnt open the quest tab when i clicked i went into client.java and found “quest tab”

The code that WAS in there was setSidebarInterface(2, -1); // quest tab

So i changed it to setSidebarInterface(2, 1789); // quest tab

Then it worked after i added the “1789” i could open the tab and its blank.

Now, from there how do i add words into it? ex. “::barrage”

and also do i need a special case for it or something, where do i add it and how? Thanks.

setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // attack tab
setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); // skills tab
setSidebarInterface(2, 1789); // quest tab
setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); // backpack tab
setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); // items wearing tab
setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); // pray tab
if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}
if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
}
if (playerAncientMagics == 2) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);
}
setSidebarInterface(7, -1); // clan chat
setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); // friend
setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); // ignore
setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); // logout tab
setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); // wrench tab
setSidebarInterface(12, 147); // run tab
setSidebarInterface(13, -1); // harp tab
// add player commands…

Read full topic
item.source: Making Quest tab say words in it? [Delta 317]
